messages.title: WHO CAN CHANGE THE FUTURE OF BRITAIN?
messages.content: Many disillusioned Labour supporters went to the Liberal Democrats in opposition to the Iraq War. The same might happen again over Brexit.

messages.title: PEOPLE ARE SWITCHING TO BACK THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS
messages.content: "Lib Dems hope to gain dozens of seats with anti-Brexit campaign." "Lib Dems have been scoring a stunning run of local success, snatching council seats in seemingly unpromising places as Rotherham, Sunderland and Kettering." "Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit."

messages.title: THIS IS OUR CHANCE TO GET REAL CHANGE
messages.content: "Millions of people have been betrayed by Jeremy Corbyn's support for a hard Brexit."

messages.title: CORBYN'S LABOUR PARTY?
messages.content: Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called the leader of the Opposition... Labour braced for new low.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to keep Britain in the single market.

issues.brexitEurope: The Lib Dems will fight hard to keep Britain in the single market and avoid a damaging hard Brexit.

quotes.text: "Many disillusioned Labour supporters went to the Liberal Democrats in opposition to the Iraq War. The same might happen again over Brexit."
"Lib Dems have been scoring a stunning run of local success, snatching council seats in seemingly unpromising places as Rotherham, Sunderland and Kettering."
"Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit."
"Liberal Democrats could be the big winners as the full pressure of the fight against a hard Brexit is felt in town and city seats explicable on Labour in-fighting."
"Brexit has strengthened the Lib Dems and further weakened Labour."
